column1: query

Could my extended sleep periods indicate that I’m catching up on earlier sleep loss?

Would incorporating short activity breaks during long periods of inactivity improve my physical health?

Could irregular eating patterns increase my stress or anxiety levels?
With an HbA1c of 5.6%, am I eating regularly enough to help maintain stable blood sugar levels?

Would planning a balanced eating schedule help support my energy and reduce anxiety?
Could a lack of outdoor time contribute to higher anxiety levels at age 28?
